aboutPage.title: I'm idoubi, a Full-Stack Engineer, Indie Maker.
bio: I was a former fan of Adobe, so I chose this nickname.
I graduated from Wuhan University in 2015, majoring in nuclear engineering, self-taught and switched to IT.
I was a former senior engineer at Tencent, WeChat Group, working as backend-develop engineer.
I am now freelancer, all in AI.
